[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-01-15 14:00:00
Surgery performed â€” open reduction internal fixation of left femur fracture.
Operative procedure completed without complications.

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-02-08 10:00:00
Patient returned within 30 days of procedure.
Wound erythema and swelling at incision site.
Superficial incision site with purulent drainage from incision.
Pain and tenderness around wound noted.
Wound culture positive for S. aureus.
Surgeon diagnosis of superficial SSI.
Skin and subcutaneous tissue only involved.
